metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2030 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from12.2 prior to 16.5.6, 16.6 prior to 16.6.4, and 16.7 prior to 16.7.2 inwhich an attacker could potentially modify the metadata of signed commits.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
